getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.hero: Your participation can transform Nepal. Join thousands of committed individuals working towards a progressive, corruption-free nation.
getInvolved.waysDesc: Choose how you want to contribute to building a better Nepal
getInvolved.volunteerDesc: Join our dedicated team of volunteers and be the change you want to see in Nepal.
getInvolved.flexibleCommitmentDesc: Choose activities that fit your schedule
getInvolved.skillDevelopmentDesc: Gain valuable experience in community organizing
getInvolved.makeRealImpactDesc: See the direct results of your contributions
getInvolved.trainingProvidedDesc: We'll equip you with everything you need
getInvolved.joinRSP: Join RSP Norway today and be part of Nepal's transformation story
getInvolved.communityOrganizerDesc: Lead local initiatives and bring Nepalis together in your city
getInvolved.digitalActivistDesc: Amplify our message through social media and online campaigns
getInvolved.policyContributorDesc: Help shape RSP's policies and strategic direction
getInvolved.fundraisingTeamDesc: Support our mission through creative fundraising initiatives
getInvolved.youthAmbassadorDesc: Engage young Nepalis and drive youth participation
getInvolved.creativeTeamDesc: Design visual content and creative materials
getInvolved.testimonial1: Being part of RSP Norway has given me a platform to contribute meaningfully to Nepal's future while staying connected to my roots.
getInvolved.testimonial2: The energy and commitment of RSP members inspire me every day. Together, we're creating real change for Nepal.
getInvolved.testimonial3: RSP gives me the opportunity to use my skills for something bigger than myself. It's about building the Nepal we all dream of.
getInvolved.testimonial4: The energy and commitment of RSP members inspires me every day. Together, we are bringing real change for Nepal.
getInvolved.thankYou: Thank you for your interest! We will contact you soon.

footer.about_description: राष्ट्रिय स्वतन्त्र पार्टी (रास्वपा) सबै नेपालीको समतामूलक उन्नतिप्रति कटिवद्ध सामाजिक न्यायसहितको उदार अर्थतन्त्रमा विश्वास गर्ने बहुलवादी लोकतान्त्रिक पार्टी हो। यसको ध्येय वैयक्तिक स्वतन्त्रता र मौलिक हकको प्रत्याभूतिपूर्वक पूर्ण लोकतान्त्रिक गणतन्त्रात्मक शासन प्रणाली भित्र विधिमा आधारित जवाफदेहीपूर्ण असल शासन मार्फत समन्यायिक समावेशी समाज निर्माण गर्नु हो।

slider.subtitle_1: Join the movement for change. RSP Norway connects the Nepali diaspora in Norway with the vision of a progressive, corruption-free Nepal built on pluralistic democracy and good governance.
slider.subtitle_2: The diaspora is key to Nepal's transformation. Connect with fellow Nepalis in Norway, participate in our initiatives, and help shape policies that matter. Together we build the Nepal we dream of.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you!
contact.description: Fill out the form below and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.success: Your message has been sent! We will get back to you soon.

notices.title: Events/Notices
notices.description: Stay connected with our vibrant school community. Explore upcoming events and important announcements.
notices.no_events_desc: Check back soon for upcoming events!
notices.no_notices_desc: Check back later for updates and announcements.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: Explore our gallery filled with memories from our events and activities.

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.subtitle: Download Documents
downloads.no_documents_desc: Try adjusting your search or filter to find what you're looking for.

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.about_description_1: RSP Norway is dedicated to empowering the Nepali community residing in Norway socially, culturally, and educationally. We are committed to providing our members with support, guidance, and opportunities to help them reach their full potential.
about-us.about_description_2: We strive to create a welcoming and inclusive environment where every individual feels valued and inspired to contribute to the community's growth and well-being.
about-us.about_description_3: Our commitment extends beyond individual empowerment to fostering a strong, united community that celebrates its heritage while embracing the future.
about-us.mission_description: To provide quality education and foster a nurturing environment for students to thrive academically and personally.
about-us.vision_description: To be a leading educational institution recognized for excellence in teaching, innovation, and community engagement.

about.title: Welcome to RSP Norway
about.description: RSP Norway is dedicated to empowering the Nepali community residing in Norway socially, culturally, and educationally. We are committed to providing our members with support, guidance, and opportunities to help them reach their full potential.

membership.title: Membership Form
membership.subtitle: Your voice matters in shaping future of our nation. Fill out the information below to become a member of RSP Norway and be part of the movement to build a progressive, corruption-free Nepal.
membership.success: Thank you for applying! We will review your application and get back to you soon.
membership.error: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again later.
membership.general_member_desc: For individuals who support RSP Norway's mission and want to stay informed.
membership.active_member_desc: For those who wish to take an active role in RSP Norway's initiatives and events.
membership.agree_terms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
membership.welcome_msg: Your membership application has been received successfully. Our team will review your application and contact you within 48 hours.
membership.contact_us_any_questions: If you have any questions about membership, feel free to contact us.

login.title: Login
login.error: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
login.password_set_success: Your password has been set successfully. You can now log in.

setPassword.title: Set Your Password
setPassword.subtitle: Welcome! Please set your password to complete your account setup.
setPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
setPassword.successMessage: Your account is now ready. You can log in with your email and password.
setPassword.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
setPassword.invalidToken: Invalid or expired link. Please contact support.
